charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.-defendant, aided and abetted by another, who are unlawfully addicted users, did possess firearms which had been shipped in interstate commerce in violation of Title 18, USC 922(g)(3) and Title 18, USC 2 (1)
RECEIVE STOLEN FIREARMS-defendant, aided and abetted by another, did possess stolen firearms which had been shipped in interstate commerce in violation of Title 18, USC 922(j) and Title 18, USC 2 (2)

18:922J.F;, 18:922G.F On or about [11/6/06] in Midland County, in the Western District of Texas defendant did possess a stolen firearm and possessed a stolen firearm as a prohibited person a drug user in violation of Title 18 USC 922(j) and 922(g)3
